articles.title: Primary elections: Billionaires, Trump's influence and the first elections after Roe v. Wade was overturned
articles.description: Illinois, Colorado, New York, Nebraska, Oklahoma, Utah, South Carolina and Mississippi all have races this Tuesday.
articles.content:
